docs.title: Index
docs.text:
Warning

DeepGroundwater is still in an ongoing beta. Expect changes before a stable v1 release

docs.title: DeepGroundwater Specification
docs.text: The required dataset formats for streamflow input ingestion, and geospatial references, into DDR routing.

docs.title: Usage
docs.text:
To build these docs locally, you can run the following lines of code to serve these docs in your localhost. Changes will update dynamially in the browser 

## optionally setup an venv
# uv venv
# source .venv/bin/activate
uv pip install -r requirements.txt
mkdocs serve

docs.title: Deep Groundwater Spec v0
docs.text:
Warning

This spec has not been accepted, and is subject to change

docs.title: License

docs.title: Abstract
docs.text: This specification defines the dataset formats for streamflow input ingestion, and geospatial references, to be used in DDR routing.

docs.title: Introduction
docs.text: The format of this specification draws from the Zarr v3 Spec
